system:
note description: "EiffelVision vertical box. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "container, box, vertical" date: "$Date: 2011-09-22 17:33:47 -0700 (Thu, 22 Sep 2011) $" revision: "$Revision: 87292 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xmlEV_VERTICAL_BOX_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_box_i.xmlEV_BOX_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE_I} -- Implementation
f_pointer_offset../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xml#f_pointer_offsetpointer_offset: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Offset of mouse pointer coordinate matching orientation, into Current. do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_application_implementationapplication_implementation.../implementation_interface/ev_application_i.xml#f_pnd_screenPnd_screen.../interface/ev_screen.xml#f_pointer_positionpointer_position.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy - ../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_screen_yscreen_y end
f_docking_dimension_of_current_item../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xml#f_docking_dimension_of_current_itemdocking_dimension_of_current_item: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Dimension of interface.item matching orientation of Current. do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight end
f_docking_dimension_of_current../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xml#f_docking_dimension_of_currentdocking_dimension_of_current: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Dimension of Current matching orientation of Current do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_positioned_i.xml#f_heightheight end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_vertical_box.xmlEV_VERTICAL_BOX note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xmlEV_VERTICAL_BOX_I
